dcterms:description: FrozenLake is a grid world environment that simulates a goal MDP. The agent receives a reward upon reaching the specified goal position. The agent can choose to move NORTH, SOUTH, EAST, or WEST, and the transition model can be chosen to be either stochastic or deterministic.
dcterms:title: FrozenLake
